Class ToDoController

java.lang.Object

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/task/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Task> findTask(@PathVariable("id") Long id)

      id - accepts Task ID to find task.
      Returns:

    • updateTask

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
